attributes.action: Danger warnings on Lilly flowers to make people aware of the severe dangers to cats!!
attributes.additional_details: After losing a beloved pet cat we wish to start a petition passing a law all establishments selling Lilly flowers to have a danger label explains how serious they are to cats! We were not aware the dangers, if we were Lilly's would not have been bought in our home. I do not wish for others to go through what we have.
